column1: #text=Last weekend , I took the train into the city with my younger brother to attend a concert .
#text=We drove to the train station to catch the 4 PM train .
#text=It took a while to find parking .
#text=Once we boarded the train , we took a seat .
#text=The train conductor came by and we purchased 2 round trip tickets with cash .
#text=The ride to the city took about an hour .
#text=Many people got on and off at every stop .
#text=There were many different types of people , the business types , students , families , and coeds .
#text=There were a couple loud babies and annoying blondes as well .
#text=After about an hour , we were almost to our stop .
#text=Once we arrived , the train pulled into the system and the conductor announced that it was the last stop and that everything had to depart .
#text=We walked onto the platform and into the train station , then were on our way .
